channel.title: I dont know how u add the yellow krown on TestScape!
channel.description:
I set the character rights on 3.. And i set my name at the client.java.. It didn't worked.. Plz, tell me how u do it (my server is based on testscape)..
If you can help, very ty!

item.title: I dont know how u add the yellow krown on TestScape!
item.dc:creator: @viper1337 viper1337
item.description:
@viper1337 wrote:

ok search for

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")

and u should c some names like:

[code]else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“viper”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“jay24”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“base”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwnzor69”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“smitty”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}[/code]

change one of the 1s that says playerRights = 3 (for mine it would be viper)
then save and open ur charators folder and click on file with ur name on it
and change the player rights to 3 save/compile/run and there u go!
GOLD CROWN!

Read full topic
